title: STAT+: Pharmalittle: We’re reading about the FDA pushing OTC meds, its new trial standards, and much more
description: FDA Commissioner Marty Makary said he believes “everything should be over the counter” unless a drug is unsafe, addictive or requires monitoring
content: FDA Commissioner Marty Makary said he believes “everything should be over the counter” unless a drug is unsafe, addictive or requires monitoring
